The injury-depleted Raptors displayed the depth of their roster once again en route to a 103-91 win over the visiting Memphis Grizzlies. "That's our strength, especially with such a long season, so many things can happen, said Anthony Parker . Anthony Parker finished with 19 points to top Toronto( 8-7), which used a balanced attack to beat the struggling Grizzlies, with seven players scoring in double figures. ( Microsoft CRM 2011 Release Candidate Available, Launch Date Set The move is an example of Steve Ballmer 's commitment last year that the company is "all in" on cloud computing. This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said in a statement. In fact, Microsoft's Dynamics CRM Online service is based on Microsoft's Dynamics CRM 2011 package, which is set for its own launch on Thursday.

realize that they do face new increased risks from natural disaster. The New York Times contrasts the recent Australian floods with the Brazilian floods. Many fewer people died in the Australian Floods. Why? "The hillside areas around Rio lacked early warning systems or effective community organizations that might have helped residents to wake one another as the rains intensified last Tuesday night, disaster experts and residents said. Most people are believed to have died early Wednesday morning as they slept, when water-loosened earth swept their houses away."
